titles.title: A resolution recognizing the life and achievements of Will Keith Kellogg.
A resolution recognizing the life and achievements of Will Keith Kellogg.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Recognizes: (1) the great contributions of Will Keith Kellogg to U.S. citizens and people of the world; (2) the 100th anniversary (April 1, 2006) of the creation of the first flaked breakfast cereal; and (3) the achievements of W.K. Kellogg and the benefits enjoyed by all those touched by his life.
